name: The breathing City
description:
The city has always been a chaotic place, growing rapidly and uncontrollably. But the recent surge of violence and madness is very unusual, even for a place like this. You are the only ones who suspect the truth, and the only ones who can do anything about it

Heavily inspired by Fantasy Flight's Arkham files series (especially eldritch horror, Arkham horror third edition , and Arkham Horror: The Card Game) the breathing city is a very narrative experience, and the world is grim and unforgiving

Art by André Seneda

Originally created for the 7drl challenge 2023

Rules manual coming soon

Warning:  Thou the game already has procedural generation systems, those are currently severely lacking in content, leading to very "samy" runs. More content is planned soon
